model.name: ViewIndexes
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW myTable ( column1 string(4000), column2 string(4000), CONSTRAINT Index1 INDEX(column1) OPTIONS(ANNOTATION 'Index 1 description'), CONSTRAINT Index2 INDEX(column2) OPTIONS(ANNOTATION 'Index 2 description') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'myTableSource', UPDATABLE 'TRUE') AS SELECT 'test' AS column1, 'test2' AS column2;
